Xin Zhang


[Resume] [Research Statement] [Teaching Statement] [Google Scholar]

Postdoctoral Associate
Computer Science and Artificial Intelligence Laboratory
Massachusetts Institute of Technology

Address: 32-G716, 77 Massachusetts Avenue, Cambridge, MA 02139, USA
E-mail: xzhang@csail.mit.edu
Phone: 706-N51-767N ("N" = "9")
Hello, I am Xin Zhang (pronunciation ≈ "shin chang"), a postdoctoral researcher at MIT. I work with Prof. Armando Solar-Lezama. I am broadly interested in topics related to programming languages and software engineering. For details, please see Research. I received my Ph.D. from Georgia Tech under the supervision of Prof. Mayur Naik.
